attributes.background:
1, Continue to pay the housing element if a claimant is sanctioned.

2, Abolish the 35 hour job search requirement and instead ask claimants to apply for a minimum of 6 jobs every fortnight similar to the previous system.

3, Abolish the minimum income floor for the self employed.
